title: Signing of the Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between the Bandaranaike International Diplomatic Training Institute (BIDTI) of Sri Lanka and the Foreign Service Academy (FSA) of Bangladesh
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Hon. Ravi Karunanayake, the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign a MoU between the Bandaranaike International Diplomatic Training Institute (BIDTI) of Sri Lanka and the Foreign Service Academy (FSA) of Bangladesh, with the objective of establishing an appropriate framework to provide information with regard to the training of diplomats of Sri Lanka and Bangladesh, exchanging of expertise knowledge and resources and to extend facilities for the participation in relevant conferences and workshops during the forthcoming State visit of H.E. the President to Bangladesh , was approved by the Cabinet.
